issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://maxroll.gg/last-epoch/build-guides/sorcerer-leveling-guide](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmaxroll.gg%2Flast-epoch%2Fbuild-guides%2Fsorcerer-leveling-guide) ### Comment > seems that the website is not being displayed correctly with adguard enabled, after disabling adguard on that website it loads fine. Username: `@AbdelrahmanMohamedDesoky` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/26wzp6wqxmsk8s0kgso8osgk0o048w8dgrcfg4uee0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/slexr4e3ii8sg8ggog04444owscgwg4af7fwr2j1kw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.18.1 (4778) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://www.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F) ### Import issue configuration (AdGuard for Windows) [Import](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=adguard%3Aimport_user_configuration%3Fbrowsing_security.enabled%3Dtrue%26browsing_security.statistics_enabled%3Dfalse%26dns.custom_bootstrap%3D%26dns.custom_fallback%3D%26dns.enabled%3Dfalse%26dns.fallback_mode%3DSystem%26dns.filters%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fwindows%252Ffilters%252F15.txt%252CUser%2Brules%26dns.filters_enabled%3Dtrue%26dns.servers%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fdns.cloudflare.com%252Fdns-query%26dns.timeout%3D0%26filters%3D2%26license_type%3Dpaid%26parental_control.enabled%3Dfalse%26product_type%3DWin%26product_version%3D7.18.1%2B%25284778%2529%26referrer%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.youtube.com%252F%26stealth.enabled%3Dfalse%26system_version%3DMicrosoft%2BWindows%2BNT%2B10.0.26100.0%26url%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fmaxroll.gg%252Flast-epoch%252Fbuild-guides%252Fsorcerer-leveling-guide%26user_agent%3DMozilla%252F5.0%2B%2528Windows%2BNT%2B10.0%253B%2BWin64%253B%2Bx64%2529%2BAppleWebKit%252F537.36%2B%2528KHTML%252C%2Blike%2BGecko%2529%2BChrome%252F126.0.0.0%2BSafari%252F537.36%26userscripts%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%252Chttps%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%26utm_campaign%3Dreport%26utm_medium%3Dassistant%26utm_source%3Dwin%26win.wfp%3Dtrue)

comment.body:
It seems that the culprit was another extension called "Night Eye" not AdGuard

Sorry for this, I will make sure that it doesn't happen again.
